briefTitle: Efficacy and Safety, Long-term Study of Zinc Acetate to Treat Wilson's Disease in Japan.

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Wilson's disease(adult, infant, pregnant woman)

Exclusion Criteria:

* Acute hepatitis
* Malignant tumor

outcomeMeasures.title: Safety and Efficacy
outcomeMeasures.description: Number of patients who have at least one adverse events. ALT Change
